text: Hey, I'm having issues with `hublParameters` . I'm passing an array based on `content.translated_content` from global partial to header component, which works for some time (maybe only minutes) and all of a sudden the array is empty. When I change name of the array it gets populated again. Is there a bug with `hublParameters` or am I missing something? Screenshot of `logInfo(hublParameters);` where you can see that I've tried changing name of the array three times (lang, langSwitcher and languages)
<@U04DLJH3W94> do we have an update on the HubL expressions?
This should be fixed now, let me know otherwise :+1:
The missing data issue with Link fields is fixed now, lmk if you are still seeing issues with it, thanks!
Change is merged and is being tested in QA, should be out early next week
